title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Introducing Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, your ultimate solution for efficient and convenient cleaning. This product comes with a total of 12 rolls, packed in two separate packs containing 6 rolls each, offering you the flexibility to use them as per your needs.

Each roll is a 'Huge Roll' with 158 sheets, equivalent to 38 regular rolls, each having 49 sheets. The 2-ply sheet size ensures durability and absorbency, making it up to 75% more absorbent than leading 1-ply brands. This means you can tackle spills and messes more effectively, using fewer sheets.

The Flex-a-Size feature allows you to select a half sheet or a full sheet, depending on the task at hand. This not only helps in reducing waste but also ensures you get the most out of each roll. The towels are white in color, adding a clean and fresh look to any space.

When compared to Bounty Paper Towels, Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels offer a similar high-quality cleaning experience, but with the added benefit of flexibility and cost-effectiveness. Experience the difference with Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels.
